column4: Hello, I sent files from windows through samba, But I can't write to them on ubuntu because i'm not the owner. can I fix this?
you can 'chmod' or 'chmod' on the files themselves or you can connectg from Ubuntu to the Samba partition with the same user as the one from Windows
I used chmod +rw but I get Operation not permitted. The owner of the folder is "nobody"
change the owner of the folder with 'chown -R' so it's recursive
